specials.name: Not To Be Trifled With
specials.description: gain +1 Effect in close combat with a large group of enemies. Once per mission, you may push yourself in melee combat without marking Grace.

specials.name: First Aid
specials.description: Survey a wounded Space Marine to temporarily reduce or ignore penalties from harm. On a 1-3 the target ignores level 1 harm; 4/5 ignore level 1 & 2 harm; 6 ignore all harm; on a Crit ignore all harm and fill in one segment of the targetâ€™s healing clock.
